metadata.name: Truth is a Helium Balloon A4
metadata.description: This NFT is part of Truth is a Helium Balloon,  by artist Anna Judd.  Each NFT is created with oil on canvas and digitally enhanced by the Scales team.  It is part of a 10k collection of NFTs that functions as a collection game with rewards.  Collect 4 adjacent scales in any painting (across or down) to earn your place in the Royalty Club and claim your share of a 5% royalty pool from secondary sales of the entire collection, Full paintings, details on the project, and Royalty Club information can be found at annajudd.com/scales and scalesNFT.com
